main event: A UFO sighting was reported on October 10, 1958, in Kentucky, characterized as a stationary silver colored, cigar-shaped object the size of a dime.
interesting points: The object was observed at three different locations (Buckley, Maysville, Lexington) at specific times,The report concluded that the object was likely a balloon,There were multiple characteristics recorded, such as the object's brightness compared to the background sky,No photographs were submitted with the report,The sighting occurred at night.
witness description: Witness observed the object while traveling in a car.
